text:
Reflections from Home: COVID-19 Responses Around the World
.
The four senior ladies of “Reflections from Home” have a candid, humorous and no-holds barred exchange about COVID-19 Responses Around the World.
.
Read more here: https://www.apart.sg/theatre/tns-reflectionsfromhome-responsesfromaroundtheworld
.
With political correctness out of the window, the ladies give their honest, no-holds barred assessment of how world leaders have been dealing with COVID-19 while touching on our own fears in Singapore as we watch other countries opening up. Their candid views are a breath of fresh air, and it’s not just Padma’s fancy virtual background!
.
#TogetherapARTsg #apARTsgSeason7 | @thenecessarystage
